pages.text: The coin pouch is the most common way of ammo for your steelpushing abilities. Crouch ($(k:key.sneak)$()) and use ($(k:key.use)$()) to add metal nuggets to it.$(br2)Don't crouch if you want to shoot ammo with steelpushes. Hold the steelpush keybind ($(k:key.cosmere.allomancy.push)$()) and then tap ($(k:key.use)$()) to shoot. If it gets stuck in a block, you will automatically get pushed away.
pages.title: Coin Pouch
